lead_paragraph: DeShawn Stevenson is about to sign with Washington, but it is not clear how his arrival will affect their decision on Jared Jeffries. The Knicks have signed Jeffries, a restricted free agent, to a five-year, $30 million offer sheet. The Wizards have until Monday to match the offer. Stevenson could be Jeffries’s replacement at shooting guard and small forward.
